channel.title: e401 on Blog
channel.description: Recent content in e401 on Blog

item.title: Nodejs Install E401
item.description: Today I created a simple nodeJS Azure Functions Applicaiton to start building out a PoC and when I tried to install it’s dependencies like so: npm install I got this little cherub back instead: npm ERR! code E401 npm ERR! Incorrect or missing password. npm ERR! If you were trying to login, change your password, create an npm ERR! authentication token or enable two-factor authentication then npm ERR! that means you likely typed your password in incorrectly.

item.title: Npm E401 and CERT_NOT_YET_VALID
item.description: Today a PR Merge resulted in a GHA failure. Sadly, this is not the only CICD pipeline to fail this year! This particular pipeline builds a NodeJS Image, pushes the image to ACR and deploys the service to a production Docker Swarm (on merge to main). This was the error: [3/7] RUN npm install: #7 1.469 npm ERR! code E401 #7 1.470 npm ERR! Unable to authenticate, need: Bearer authorization_uri=https://login.windows.net/736f9f**-09-49-86**-b******31f407, Basic realm=“https://pkgsprodsu3weu.
